text: All roof accessories (curbs, hatches, vents, anchors) match approved shop drawings and specifications
Roof curbs properly sized for equipment and coordinated with mechanical/electrical trades
Flashings, boots, collars, sealants, and fasteners approved by roofing system manufacturer
Materials delivered undamaged and stored in dry, secure location
Curbs plumb, level, and fastened to roof deck/substrate
Roof hatch frame and lid installed per manufacturer's instruction
Curb and hatch heights comply with fall protection code and slope requirements

id: C. Flashing Integration with Roofing System

text: Curb base flashed in using same membrane system (torch-on, TPO, etc.)
Vertical flashing extends up curb walls and overlapped by cap flashing
Round penetrations flashed using approved boots or pitch pockets filled and sealed
All seams welded (TPO) or bonded (SBS) and inspected by membrane manufacturer
MEP trades coordinated for layout, timing, and type of roof penetrations
All conduits, ducts, and vents sealed watertight at roof entry points
Strapping, bracketing, and anchorage secured without damaging membrane
Tie-back anchors, safety lines, and davit bases installed per engineered layout
All anchor systems fastened into structure and properly waterproofed
System tagged and certified by third-party as per provincial safety code (OH&S)
QA/QC visual and water-tightness inspection completed
Roofing consultant/manufacturer sign-off for membrane warranty
As-built drawings updated with roof penetration locations
